Thank you for taking time yesterday to interview me for the childcare assistant's position that will become available in August. 


After taking with you. I am very excited about the possibility of joining your company. I am confident I could do a good job for you. 


I look forward to hearing your decision and hope it will be a favorable one.

Sincerely. 
Dan Hardy

Dear Mr. Gilbert

Thank you for taking time yesterday to interview me for the childcare assistant's position that will become available in August.


After taking with you. I am very excited about the possibility of joining your company. I am confident I could do a good job for you. 


I look forward to hearing your decision and hope it will be a favorable one. 

Sincerely.
Dan Hardy
